allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add comprehensive security and API enhancements

- Add JWT authentication configuration with production validation
- Implement rate limiting middleware with slowapi
- Add structured error handling with custom exceptions
- Create auth dependencies for JWT validation
- Add Pydantic schemas for strategy parameters validation
- Enhance router error handling across all endpoints
- Add comprehensive router tests \(data, strategies, trades\)
- Update CI workflow with additional security checks
- Add production secret validation in config

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(npx wrangler pages project create potential-parakeet --production-branch=main)
